title: MyFitness-Home Workout
description: Developed an Android fitness application from scratch, combining video tutorials for each exercise with live chat and video call interactions between users and trainers.

title: Classic Sudoku Game
description: Developed an Android Sudoku application, featuring a solver using recursion and backtracking algorithms.

title: QuickNews
description: Integrated Newsdata.io API to fetch and display real-time news data.Displaying news for different categories such as Sports, Technology, Science, etc.
